string-array.name: intro_slide_titles
string-array.item: Empower Your Finances with Our Self-Custodial Bitcoin & Lightning Wallet

string-array.name: intro_slide_texts
string-array.item: Welcome to our cutting-edge Bitcoin wallet! Take control of your finances securely with our self-custodial features, allowing you full ownership and management of your Bitcoin assets.
Your financial independence matters. With our wallet, your Bitcoin is held securely in your hands. No intermediaries, no compromises â€“ just complete control over your assets.

Experience lightning-fast transactions with our Lightning Network integration. Seamlessly send and receive Bitcoin with incredible speed and reduced fees, unlocking a new era of financial possibilities.
Introducing Cashu as a convenient custodial feature. Store and manage your digital assets across "banks" leveraging the advantages of custodial support.
Accessible to all, TchaiCASH offers a user-friendly experience. Manage your Bitcoin effortlessly, ensuring financial empowerment at your fingertips.

Join us in embracing the future of finance. TchaiCASH evolves with technology, ensuring you stay ahead in the ever-changing digital financial ecosystem. Unlock the potential of your finances today with our versatile Bitcoin and Lightning wallet, offering both self-custodial control.
